welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bradford West Gwillimbury, a charming town on the border of Ontario and Simcoe County. Known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buttonville Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Buttonville Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lake Simcoe Regional Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lake Simcoe Regional Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
